mapper.update: update prj_progress_fill set prj_name=#{ppf.prjName}, task_no=#{ppf.taskNo}, prj_type=#{ppf.prjType}, prj_money=#{ppf.prjMoney}, contract_money=#{ppf.contractMoney}, prj_leader=#{ppf.prjLeader}, provisional_sum=#{ppf.provisionalSum}, prj_start_time=#{ppf.prjStartTime}, prj_end_time=#{ppf.prjEndTime}, prj_mode=#{ppf.prjMode}, this_time=#{ppf.thisTime}, all_money=#{ppf.allMoney}, contract_income=#{ppf.contractIncome}, all_money_yuan=#{ppf.allMoneyYuan}, prj_this_income_yuan=#{ppf.prjThisIncomeYuan}, yg_design=#{ppf.ygDesign}, frist_design=#{ppf.fristDesign}, second_design=#{ppf.secondDesign}, rate=#{ppf.rate}, rate_money=#{ppf.rateMoney}, thismonth_completecontent=#{ppf.thismonthCompletecontent}, nextmoney_plan=#{ppf.nextmoneyPlan} where ppf_id=#{ppf.ppfId}
mapper.select: select a.*,c.contract_no,d.end_money,e.all_money_yuan as jzqnMoney,(f.all_money_yuan-e.all_money_yuan) as jnMoney,b.status modeStatus from prj_progress_fill as a left join mode_status as b on a.ppf_id=b.mode_id LEFT JOIN (select * from cj_contract cc LEFT JOIN mode_status ms on cc.cj_id = ms.mode_id where ms.`status` = '2') as c on a.task_no=c.task_code LEFT JOIN (select * from contract_work where type='2') as d ON c.contract_no=d.cj_contract_code LEFT JOIN(select a.* from prj_progress_fill a left join mode_status as b on a.ppf_id=b.mode_id WHERE b.status=2 AND this_time < (select CONCAT(YEAR(CURDATE()),'-','01')) ORDER BY this_time desc) as e on a.task_no=e.task_no LEFT JOIN(select a.* from prj_progress_fill a left join mode_status as b on a.ppf_id=b.mode_id WHERE b.status=2 AND this_time like (select CONCAT(YEAR(CURDATE()),'%')) ORDER BY this_time desc) as f ON a.task_no=f.task_no where b.status=0 or b.status = 1 or b.status = 2 GROUP BY ppf_id
select * from prj_progress_fill_info where ppf_id=#{id} and type=#{type}
select * from prj_progress_fill where ppf_id=#{id}
select a.* from prj_progress_fill as a left join mode_status as b on a.ppf_id=b.mode_id where task_no=#{no} and b.status=2 ORDER BY this_time desc LIMIT 1
select money from prj_progress_fill_info where ppf_id=#{id} and department=#{department} and type='1'
select * from prj_progress_fill_cj where ppf_id=#{id}
select a.* from prj_progress_fill as a left join mode_status as b on a.ppf_id=b.mode_id where b.status=2 and a.status=#{status}
mapper.update: update prj_progress_fill set status=#{status},infos=#{infos} where ppf_id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT task_no from prj_progress_fill where this_time like #{year}
select IFNULL(a.all_cost,0) as all_cost,a.ppf_id from prj_progress_fill as a LEFT JOIN mode_status as b on a.ppf_id=b.mode_id where b.status=2 and a.task_no=#{no} ORDER BY a.this_time desc limit 1
SELECT IFNULL(money,0) as money FROM prj_progress_fill_info where type=6 and department=#{department} and ppf_id=#{id}
SELECT count(1) FROM prj_progress_fill_info where type=6 and department=#{department} and ppf_id=#{id}
SELECT all_money FROM prj_progress_fill where task_no=#{no} ORDER BY this_time desc limit 1

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(d.all_money_yuan),0)as all_money_yuan from ( select * from ( SELECT * from prj_progress_fill where this_time BETWEEN #{start} and #{end} ORDER BY this_time desc ) as a group by a.task_no ) as b LEFT JOIN mode_status as c on b.ppf_id=c.mode_id LEFT JOIN prj_progress_fill_info as d on b.ppf_id=d.ppf_id where c.status=2 and d.type=1 and d.department=#{dept}

SELECT SUM(money) as money FROM prj_progress_fill as a LEFT JOIN mode_status as b on a.ppf_id=b.mode_id LEFT JOIN prj_progress_fill_info as c on a.ppf_id=c.ppf_id where a.this_time like #{year} and c.type=5 and c.department=#{department} and b.status=2

SELECT c.money as prj_this_income,d.prj_money from prj_progress_fill_info as c LEFT JOIN prj_progress_fill as d on c.ppf_id=d.ppf_id where c.ppf_id in( SELECT ppf_id FROM prj_progress_fill as a LEFT JOIN mode_status as b on a.ppf_id=b.mode_id where b.status=2 and this_time like #{time}) and c.type=2 and c.department=#{department}

SELECT c.money as prj_this_income,d.prj_money from prj_progress_fill_info as c LEFT JOIN prj_progress_fill as d on c.ppf_id=d.ppf_id where c.ppf_id in( SELECT ppf_id FROM prj_progress_fill as a LEFT JOIN mode_status as b on a.ppf_id=b.mode_id where b.status=2 and this_time like #{time} and prj_type like #{type}) and c.type=2 and c.department=#{department}

STATUS = 2 ORDER BY this_time DESC ) a LEFT JOIN (select * from cj_contract cc LEFT JOIN mode_status ms on cc.cj_id = ms.mode_id where ms.`status` = '2') as c on a.task_no=c.task_code LEFT JOIN (select * from contract_work where type='2') as d ON c.contract_no=d.cj_contract_code LEFT JOIN(select a.* from prj_progress_fill a left join mode_status as b on a.ppf_id=b.mode_id WHERE b.status=2 AND this_time <(select CONCAT(YEAR(CURDATE()),'-','01'))) as e on a.task_no=e.task_no LEFT JOIN(select a.* from prj_progress_fill a left join mode_status as b on a.ppf_id=b.mode_id WHERE b.status=2 AND this_time like (select CONCAT(YEAR(CURDATE()),'%'))) as f ON a.task_no=f.task_no GROUP BY a.task_no

SELECT a.cj_id,a.task_code,a.contract_name,a.contract_no,a.contract_money,a.temporary_money,IFNULL(b.income_all,0) as main_department_money FROM cj_contract as a LEFT JOIN ( select * from prj_progress_fill_cj ORDER BY bq desc ) as b on a.cj_id=b.cj_id LEFT JOIN mode_status as c on a.cj_id=c.mode_id where c.status=2 and a.task_code like #{no} limit 1
SELECT a.* FROM prj_progress_fill_fb as a LEFT JOIN mode_status as b on a.ppf_id=b.mode_id where a.fb_id=#{id} and b.status=2 ORDER BY bq desc LIMIT 1
SELECT * FROM prj_progress_fill_cj where cj_id=#{id} and bq=#{bq} limit 1
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM prj_progress_fill_cj where cj_id=#{id} and bq=#{bq}

SELECT * FROM prj_progress_fill_fb where ppf_id=#{id}

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(c.all_money_yuan),0)as all_money_yuan FROM prj_progress_fill as a LEFT JOIN mode_status as b on a.ppf_id=b.mode_id LEFT JOIN prj_progress_fill_info as c on a.ppf_id=c.ppf_id where b.status=2 and a.prj_type like #{type} and a.this_time like #{time} and department=#{dept}

SELECT * FROM prj_progress_fill_fb where fb_id=#{no} ORDER BY bq desc limit 1

SELECT a.prj_name,a.task_no,a.this_time,b.money_yuan as benqishouru FROM prj_progress_fill a LEFT JOIN mode_status AS m ON a.ppf_id = m.mode_id LEFT JOIN prj_progress_fill_info b on a.ppf_id=b.ppf_id where a.this_time=#{time} AND b.department=#{nowStr} and m.status=2
